opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Lehigh Valley Railroad Company v. Royal Indemnity Company and Others

opinion:
253 U.S. 483

40 S.Ct. 482

64 L.Ed. 1024

LEHIGH VALLEY RAILROAD COMPANY, petitioner,
v.
ROYAL INDEMNITY COMPANY and others.

Nos. 819 to 830.

Supreme Court of the United States

April 26, 1920

Messrs. Lindley M. Garrison, Edgar H. Boles, and Richard W. Barrett, all of New York City, and Geo. S. Hobart, of Jersey City, N. J., for petitioner.

1

Petition for writs of certiorari to the Court of Errors and Appeals of the State of New Jersey denied.
